$description: Core spacing primitives using numeric scale (0-1000). Based on 4px/0.25rem base unit. Use spacing tokens for margins, paddings, and gaps.

0.$description: Zero spacing. Use for: removing default margins/padding.

50.$description: Micro spacing (2px). Use for: fine adjustments, hairline gaps.

100.$description: Extra small spacing (4px). Use for: tight component internals, icon gaps.

150.$description: Small-extra small spacing (6px). Use for: compact elements.

200.$description: Small spacing (8px). Use for: standard component gaps, form field margins.

250.$description: Small-medium spacing (10px). Use for: tight padding in compact components.

300.$description: Medium-small spacing (12px). Use for: standard component internal padding.

400.$description: Medium spacing (16px). DEFAULT. Use for: standard gaps, modal padding.

500.$description: Medium-large spacing (20px). Use for: generous padding, card spacing.

600.$description: Large spacing (24px). Use for: section padding within components.

800.$description: Extra large spacing (32px). Use for: major section separation.

1000.$description: 2X large spacing (40px). Use for: page-level margins, hero sections.

1200.$description: 3X large spacing (48px). Use for: maximum separation.

gridSpacing.$description: Grid and layout gutter spacing based on 8px grid.

100.$description: Extra small grid gap (8px). Use for: compact card grids.

200.$description: Small grid gap (16px). Use for: standard card grids.

300.$description: Medium grid gap (24px). Use for: default content grids.

400.$description: Large grid gap (32px). Use for: spacious card layouts.

500.$description: Extra large grid gap (40px). Use for: hero grids.

600.$description: 2X large grid gap (48px). Use for: maximum separation in grids.

verticalRhythm.$description: Baseline-aligned spacing for vertical rhythm in typography-heavy layouts.

100.$description: Quarter baseline (6.4px). Use for: list item spacing.

200.$description: Half baseline (12.8px). Use for: heading bottom margins.

300.$description: Three-quarter baseline (19.2px). Use for: paragraph spacing.

600.$description: 1.5 baselines (38.4px). Use for: heading top margins.

800.$description: Double baseline (51.2px). Use for: major section breaks.

1200.$description: Triple baseline (76.8px). Use for: page section breaks.
